channel.title: Comments on: I’m fool, in front of Windows

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description:
I'm more stupid than I was thinking - I installed Windows Search on my laptop which is running Windows XP, now the interface is same (or similar) to Vista now, means I cannot do "search in file" easily.
Get to roll it back.
item.content:encoded:
I’m more stupid than I was thinking – I installed Windows Search on my laptop which is running Windows XP, now the interface is same (or similar) to Vista now, means I cannot do “search in file” easily.

Get to roll it back.
